issues.description: In the template PersonService, the methods savePerson, deletePerson, and getAllPersons are declared public so that PersonResource (in a different package) can call them. In the solution these methods have been changed to protected, making them inaccessible to PersonResource and breaking the endpoint implementations.
issues.suggested_fix: Restore public visibility for savePerson, deletePerson, and getAllPersons in PersonService in the solution to match the template and allow access from PersonResource.
